attributes.action: To get a crossing outside castle hills school in Scawthorpe too many accidents.
attributes.additional_details: Main road, drivers drive too fast too many accidents
attributes.background: To get a crossing put outside castle hills primary school it is on a main road. Drivers drive far too fast and in a morning or afternoon it’s dangerous crossing the road with children.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of Doncaster Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could also start a petition to Doncaster Council, you can find out more information about this here: https://www.doncaster.gov.uk/services/get-in-touch/submit-a-petition
